comments.selectedText:
- [ ] 9. Create unit tests for Hazelcast configuration
  - File: src/test/java/com/example/workflow/config/HazelcastAutoConfigurationTest.java
  - Test HazelcastInstance bean creation
  - Test configuration property binding
  - Test embedded instance initialization
  - Purpose: Ensure configuration works correctly and beans are properly created
  - _Requirements: 5.1, 5.4_

- [ ] 10. Create unit tests for enhanced service delegates
  - File: src/test/java/com/example/workflow/tasks/ServiceDelegateHazelcastTest.java
  - Test putServiceDelegate with mocked HazelcastInstance
  - Test getServiceDelegate with mocked HazelcastInstance
  - Test error handling scenarios
  - Purpose: Verify service delegate behavior with Hazelcast integration
  - _Leverage: existing test patterns and mocking frameworks_
  - _Requirements: 5.1, 5.2, 5.3_

- [ ] 12. Add logging configuration for Hazelcast operations
  - File: src/main/resources/application.yaml (modify existing)
  - Configure logging levels for Hazelcast packages
  - Add logging for service delegate operations
  - Purpose: Enable proper monitoring and troubleshooting
  - _Leverage: existing logging configuration_
  - _Requirements: 4.2, 4.3_

- [ ] 13. Create basic performance test for cache operations
  - File: src/test/java/com/example/workflow/performance/HazelcastPerformanceTest.java
  - Test cache operation latency and throughput
  - Test memory usage patterns
  - Test behavior under load
  - Purpose: Verify performance requirements are met
  - _Requirements: Performance requirements_
